actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend section 552 of title 5, United States Code (known as the Freedom of Information Act) to require Federal agencies to respond to requests for certain information no later than 15 days after the receipt of each such request.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Requires, under the Freedom of Information Act, that Federal agencies respond to requests for specified information no later than fifteen days after the receipt of each such request.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 552 of title 5, United States Code (known as the Freedom of Information Act) to require Federal agencies to respond to requests for certain information no later than 15 days after the receipt of each such request.
